c74object.name: seq.bar~

attribute.name: position
attribute.digest: A value between 0 and 1 immediately shifts the rampâ€™s phase to that point.

attribute.name: transportstate
attribute.digest: Turns the phasor on or off

attribute.name: syncupdate
attribute.digest: When enabled, changes to parameters are deferred until the phasor wraps.

attribute.name: transport
attribute.description: This attribute names a master time transport. If internal frequencies are specified using a 'relative' unit (for example: ticks, bars.beats.units, or notevalues), then the named transport is used to determine the frequency based on tempo, time-signature, and other related information. This defaults to the global 'internal' transport, but any named transport can be used.

c74object.description: seq.bar~ generates transport-synced phasor signals for driving sequencer timing.
